metadata.title: CVE-2018-14045 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The FIRFilter::evaluateFilterMulti function in FIRFilter.cpp inlibSoundTouch.a in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit), asdemonstrated by SoundStretch.

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
